og.title: Here’s my ACA (ObamaCare) experience

twitter.description: I thought it might be helpful to some if I could share some facts about my recent experience with the ACA. My history is that I had my own business for many years and retired from working over 10 years ago. I am not old enough to receive Medicare benefits or poor enough to qualify for Medicaid. I always purchased health insurance for my family because I felt there was too much risk without it and I would never expect someone else to pay my medical bills.When I retired, there was no retirement
twitter.title: Here’s my ACA (ObamaCare) experience

article_metadata.description: I thought it might be helpful to some if I could share some facts about my recent experience with the ACA. My history is that I had my own business for many years and retired from working over 10 years ago. I am not old enough to receive Medicare benefits or poor enough to qualify for Medicaid. I always purchased health insurance for my family because I felt there was too much risk without it and I would never expect someone else to pay my medical bills.When I retired, there was no retirement
